DyMobile
A safe digital world for children

A mobile platform built around parent‚Äìchild linking: per-child lock system, supervised social media, and fun content. Parents keep full control; kids get safe, endless fun.

Features
üîê
Pattern Lock System
A unique pattern password for each child account. Parents are protected with a separate PIN. Account switching is secure and fast.
üë•
Multiple Child Profiles
Multiple child profiles under one parent account. Easy profile selection and management with a grid view.
üì∏
Supervised Social Media
Instagram-like feed, stories, and comments ‚Äî but nothing can be shared without parent approval. A safe social experience.
‚úÖ
Post & Follow Approval
Every post and follow request from kids goes to the parent. Nothing is published without approval.
üé¨
Photo & Video
Built-in camera, album, and video trimming. The dedicated DyMobile camera supports kids‚Äô creativity.
üîî
Real-time Notifications
Real-time badge system and SignalR-based notifications for new follow requests and pending posts.
üõ°Ô∏è
Parent Panel
üîë
PIN Protection
Access to parent settings is only possible with a PIN. Children cannot enter the parent area.
üîí
Child Password Management
The pattern lock for each child is set and can be changed by the parent.
üö¶
Access Permission Control
Story, post, and follow permissions can be turned on or off separately for each child.
üìã
Post Approval Queue
Content that children want to share goes to the parent first; nothing is published without approval.
üë´
Friend Requests
All follow requests that children accept must be approved by the parent.
‚ûï
Add Child Account
Create a new child profile in seconds with a name and pattern password. No limit.
üó∫Ô∏è
How It Works
üì≤
Sign Up
Create a parent account and set a PIN to secure the panel.
üëß
Add Child
Create a name and pattern lock for each child.
üéõÔ∏è
Set Permissions
Parent sets social media, post, and follow permissions.
üöÄ
Explore!
Kids sign in to their profiles, play, and socialise ‚Äî safe and fun!
A safe digital world

With DY Mobile, give your kids endless fun while keeping full control. One app, the whole family.
